title: Jennifer Garner showcases her sophisticated style for Sunday church service in LA
text:
She's the busy mom-of-three, CEO and actress.

However, Jennifer still manages to ensure she makes it to church every Sunday - rain, hail or shine.

The 47-year-old beauty was seen attending Sunday's Pacific Palisades service with two of her children in a very chic and sophisticated get-up.

Scroll down for video

Stylish: Jennifer Garner showcased her chic and sophisticated style on Sunday when she stepped out with daughter Violet, 13, and son Samuel, seven, for church

Jennifer rocked a cream colored turtleneck sweater that hugged her toned frame.

She teamed the look with an over-the-knee navy skirt that was cinched in at the waist before flaring out.

The Peppermint star added to her 5ft8 stature with a pair of gorgeous nude pumps that featured a tie around the ankle.

Stunner: Jennifer rocked a cream colored turtleneck sweater that hugged her toned frame

Fashionista: The Peppermint star added to her 5ft8 stature with a pair of gorgeous nude pumps that featured a tie around the ankle

Jennifer accessorised with a large black bag and kept a low profile with a pair of shades over her eyes.

The beauty appeared to be wearing a minimal amount of makeup, complete with a pop of color on her lip.

Joining Jennifer was her look-a-like daughter, Violet, 13. She rocked a grey longline T-shirt and a pink skirt and Converse sneakers to match.

Mini-me: Joining Jennifer was her look-a-like daughter, Violet, 13

Casual: Violet rocked a grey longline T-shirt and a pink skirt and Converse sneakers to match

Her son Samuel, seven, was also in attendance with a blue button-up polo shirt and jeans.

Not seen with the actress was her ex-husband, Ben Affleck and their middle child, Seraphina, 10, who are frequently seen joining her at church.

The former couple began dating back in mid-2004 after becoming friends on the sets of the films, Pearl Harbor (2001) and Daredevil (2003).

Youngest: Her son Samuel, seven, was also in attendance with a blue button-up polo shirt and jeans

Daddy daughter day: Not seen with the actress was her ex-husband, Ben Affleck and their middle child, Seraphina, 10, who are frequently seen joining her at church

In June 2005, Jennifer and Ben married in a private Turks and Caicos ceremony.

They called in quits ten years later in June 2015.

After two years, they jointly filed their divorce legal documents in April 2017 and their divorce was finalized in October 2018.
